Submitter Information: Janssen Diagnostics, a division of Janssen Pharmaceutica NV
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Analyte(s): H275Y mutation of Influenza A subtype 2009 H1
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Idylla Respiratory (IFV-RSV) Panel, a molecular in vitro diagnostic for detection of influenza and RSV from nasopharyngeal swabs using automated RT-PCR on the Idylla system
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of nucleic acids for Influenza A (and subtypes), Influenza B, and Respiratory Syncytial Virus (A and B) from nasopharyngeal swabs in viral transport media of adult and pediatric patients to aid in diagnosis of respiratory viral infection, used in conjunction with clinical and laboratory findings.
